Indian Economy.title: JD(U) leader Sanjay Jha interview: ‘Modi played a role (in Bihar win) … him as PM, Nitish Kumar as CM a dream combination’
Indian Economy.summary: 'Bihar is now in a take-off stage ... Next five years for the youth. We have promised one crore jobs. Priority is to get investment and industry,' says Sanjay Jha

Indian Economy.title: Indian investors must have at least 35% of financial assets in securities abroad: BayFort Capital’s Ketul Sakhpara
Indian Economy.summary: Indian investors should allocate 35% of assets abroad, emphasizing global diversification for enhanced portfolio stability and returns.

Startups & Funding.title: Grime is gold: Pollution season turns into peak season for clean-air startups
Startups & Funding.summary: Following the pollution spike after Diwali, climate-tech startups in India are experiencing increased demand for air purifiers and clean-air solutions. Companies like Qubo and Atovio are innovating products as demand surges.

Banking & Finance.title: NUCFDC to urge RBI to allow small UCBs to offer digital services
Banking & Finance.summary: Under RBI regulations, only banks with a net worth of more than  ₹50 crore are allowed to offer digital services and internet banking facilities.

Banking & Finance.title: Bank holidays next week: When are banks closed from 17-23 November? — Check here
Banking & Finance.summary: Bank holiday next week: According to the RBI calendar, banks across India will be shut two days this week — Saturday, 22 November and Sunday, 23 November. On all other days, banking operations will remain open as usual.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI may approve 1-3% provisioning floor for stage-2 loans under ECL framework: Sources
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI may approve reduced provisioning for stage-2 loans, lowering requirements from 5% to 1-3% under ECL guidelines, sources say.

Technology Sector.title: 2 labourers killed after soil caves in at construction site in Byculla
Technology Sector.summary: The incident was reported at Habib mansion situated along Tank Pakadi road at Byculla west at 2.41pm on Saturday. According to the information furnished by the BMC, the mishap occurred during the course of foundation and piling work at a building.

Technology Sector.summary: Parents of Anshika Gaud, who was undergoing treatment after being made to do the sit-ups, blamed a teacher and the school for her death.
